message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.DL. 

The paper deals with a computer vision problem of handwritten text segmentation using deep learning techniques. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes an end-to-end learning approach using a convolutional neural network, which falls under the category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also discusses the use of a cross-entropy based loss function, which is a common technique in information retrieval (cs.IR) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper uses synthetic data to train the network, which is a common technique in deep learning (cs.DL).
